CardPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.NAME: Diamond Strike
CardPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Diamond Card to your hand.

CardPlayerMod:BadJoker.NAME: Bad Joker
CardPlayerMod:BadJoker.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Normal Cards to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
CardPlayerMod:BadJoker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Normal Cards to add to your hand.

CardPlayerMod:Configure.NAME: Configure
CardPlayerMod:Configure.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.
